mapper.sql: UPDATED_USER, REMOTE, TARGET_PREMIUM, NAME, CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE, CREATED_USER, CHANNEL_CODE, ADDRESS, DEPT_CODE, NODE_CODE, UPDATED_DATE, ACCOUNT, CONTACT, PHONE, VALID_IND, CREATED_DATE, MOBILE, EMAIL, NODE_NAME, VPN_NO, GET_FLAG, CLOSE_FLAG, CLOSE_DATE

mn.UPDATED_USER, REMOTE, TARGET_PREMIUM, NAME, CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE, mn.CREATED_USER, mn.CHANNEL_CODE, ADDRESS, mn.DEPT_CODE, NODE_CODE, mn.UPDATED_DATE, ACCOUNT, CONTACT, PHONE, mn.VALID_IND, mn.CREATED_DATE, MOBILE, EMAIL, NODE_NAME, VPN_NO, CLOSE_FLAG, CLOSE_DATE

UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", REMOTE as "remote", TARGET_PREMIUM as "targetPremium", NAME as "name", CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE as "channelPartnerType", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", CHANNEL_CODE as "channelCode", ADDRESS as "address", DEPT_CODE as "deptCode", NODE_CODE as "nodeCode", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", ACCOUNT as "account", CONTACT as "contact", PHONE as "phone", VALID_IND as "validInd", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", MOBILE as "mobile", EMAIL as "email", NODE_NAME as "nodeName", VPN_NO as "vpnNo", CLOSE_FLAG as "closeFlag", CLOSE_DATE as "closeDate"
mapper.update:
update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOTE = #{remote,jdbcType=CHAR},
TARGET_PREMIUM = #{targetPremium,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE = #{channelPartnerType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_NAME = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VPN_NO = #{vpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOTE = #{remote,jdbcType=CHAR}, TARGET_PREMIUM = #{targetPremium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE = #{channelPartnerType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_NAME = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VPN_NO = #{vpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOTE = #{remote,jdbcType=CHAR},
TARGET_PREMIUM = #{targetPremium,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE = #{channelPartnerType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = sysdate,
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_NAME = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VPN_NO = #{vpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOTE = #{remote,jdbcType=CHAR}, TARGET_PREMIUM = #{targetPremium,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_PARTNER_TYPE = #{channelPartnerType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_NAME = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VPN_NO = #{vpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE mn left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL pb on mn.channel_code = pb.channel_code left join CHANNEL_MAIN cm on cm.channel_code = mn.channel_code left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on cm.business_line = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1
select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID_IND = 1

select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select pb.CHANNEL_CODE, pb.MEDIUM_CNAME, mn.NODE_CODE, NODE_NAME, TARGET_PREMIUM, ADDRESS, mn.DEPT_CODE, bl.LINE_NAME BUSINESS_LINE, decode(REMOTE, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') REMOTE, NAME, ACCOUNT, mn.CONTACT, mn.UPDATED_DATE, to_char(mn.CLOSE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') CLOSE_DATE, mn.CLOSE_FLAG, MOBILE, EMAIL, wm_concat(SALESMAN_CNAME) SALESMAN_CNAME from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL pb left join CHANNEL_MAIN cm on cm.channel_code = pb.channel_code left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on cm.business_line = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1 left join (select cm.mainten_code, c.* from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE c left join (select * from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_MAINTAIN where VALID_IND = 1) cm on c.node_code = cm.node_code) mn on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE left join (select * from SALESMAN where VALID_IND = 1) s on s.SALESMAN_CODE = mn.mainten_code
and pb.VALID_IND = 1 group by pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, mn.NODE_CODE, NODE_NAME, TARGET_PREMIUM, ADDRESS, REMOTE, NAME, ACCOUNT, mn.CONTACT, MOBILE, EMAIL, mn.DEPT_CODE, bl.LINE_NAME, mn.UPDATED_DATE, mn.CLOSE_FLAG, mn.CLOSE_DATE order by mn.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select , MEDIUM_CNAME,mn.DEPT_CODE || '-' || dept_simple_name DEPT_CNAME from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE mn left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = mn.CHANNEL_CODE and pb.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on mn.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE and dept.VALID_IND = 1

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.update: update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set VALID_IND = 0, GET_FLAG = 0, --核心取数标识（1表示取数） UPDATED_DATE = sysdate, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set GET_FLAG = 1, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NODE_CODE = (select t1.NODE_CODE from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE t1 where not exists (select 1 from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE t2 where t1.CHANNEL_CODE = t2.CHANNEL_CODE and t1.CREATED_DATE > t2.CREATED_DATE and t2.VALID_IND = 1) and t1.VALID_IND = 1 and t1.channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set CLOSE_FLAG = '1', CLOSE_DATE = sysdate, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NODE_CODE = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_NODE set DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate where 1=1 and CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID_IND = '1' and DEPT_CODE != #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
